page.title: 16Facilities in the Addingtons
page.content: There are no buses in Gt.Addington but there are 10 buses a week in Little Addington.The bus starts at Wellingborough and goes into Irthlingborough and then comes into Little Addington.A greengroer brings his mobile shop to the villages twice a week and the butcher comes three times a week.The fish-monger and the mobile chip shop visit the villages once a week.Every two weeks the Northants mobile library van comes and people change their books.The dairies deliver milk six days a week.Newspapers are delivered from the shop at Crow Hill. Each village has a telephone box and in Great Addington there is a small Post Office.There is a Publichouse in both villages,"The Hare and Hounds"in Great Addington and "The Bell"in Little Addington.
